kabasuji.model

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • kabasuji.model.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    this class keeps track of all the values asociated with tiles, like if they are part of a board or piece, or it they have a color or number, or if they are a hint
    Author:
    Ethan
    See Also:
